verses.verse: זְכֹ֤ר <S%H2142><s%> Remember יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> O LORD מֶֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> what הָ֣יָה <S%H1961><s%> has befallen לָ֔נוּ [הַבֵּיט כ] (הַבִּ֖יטָה <S%H5027><s%> behold ק) וּרְאֵ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> and behold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶרְפָּתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H2781><s%> our reproach
נַחֲלָתֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5159><s%> Our inheritance נֶֽהֶפְכָ֣ה <S%H2015><s%> is turned לְזָרִ֔ים <S%H2114><s%> to strangers בָּתֵּ֖ינוּ <S%H1004><s%> our houses לְנָכְרִֽים׃ <S%H5237><s%> to aliens

יְתוֹמִ֤ים <S%H3490><s%> We are orphans הָיִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> have become [אֵין כ] (וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> else ק) אָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> A father אִמֹּתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H517><s%> our mothers כְּאַלְמָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H490><s%> [are] as widows

מֵימֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H4325><s%> our water בְּכֶ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> for money שָׁתִ֔ינוּ <S%H8354><s%> We have drunken עֵצֵ֖ינוּ <S%H6086><s%> our wood בִּמְחִ֥יר <S%H4242><s%> A price יָבֹֽאוּ׃ <S%H935><s%> comes

עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> are at צַוָּארֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H6677><s%> Our necks נִרְדָּ֔פְנוּ <S%H7291><s%> [are] under persecution יָגַ֖עְנוּ <S%H3021><s%> we labour [לֹא כ] (וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not ק) הֽוּנַֽח־ <S%H5117><s%> [and] have no rest לָֽנוּ׃

מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4713><s%> Egyptian נָתַ֣נּוּ <S%H5414><s%> We have given יָ֔ד <S%H3027><s%> the hand אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> [and to] the Assyrians לִשְׂבֹּ֥עַֽ <S%H7646><s%> to be satisfied לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> with bread

אֲבֹתֵ֤ינוּ <S%H1><s%> Our fathers חָֽטְאוּ֙ <S%H2398><s%> have sinned [אֵינָם כ] (וְאֵינָ֔ם <S%H369><s%> else ק) [אֲנַחְנוּ כ] (וַאֲנַ֖חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> ourselves ק) עֲוֹנֹתֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5771><s%> their iniquities סָבָֽלְנוּ׃ <S%H5445><s%> and we have borne

עֲבָדִים֙ <S%H5650><s%> Servants מָ֣שְׁלוּ <S%H4910><s%> have ruled בָ֔נוּ פֹּרֵ֖ק <S%H6561><s%> over us [there is] none that doth deliver אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> There מִיָּדָֽם׃ <S%H3027><s%> [us] out of their hand

בְּנַפְשֵׁ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5315><s%> with [the peril of] our lives נָבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> We gat לַחְמֵ֔נוּ <S%H3899><s%> our bread מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because חֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> of the sword הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness

עוֹרֵ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5785><s%> Our skin כְּתַנּ֣וּר <S%H8574><s%> like an oven נִכְמָ֔רוּ <S%H3648><s%> was black מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> because זַלְעֲפ֥וֹת <S%H2152><s%> of the terrible רָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> famine

נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> the women בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion עִנּ֔וּ <S%H6031><s%> They ravished בְּתֻלֹ֖ת <S%H1330><s%> [and] the maids בְּעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

שָׂרִים֙ <S%H8269><s%> Princes בְּיָדָ֣ם <S%H3027><s%> by their hand נִתְל֔וּ <S%H8518><s%> are hanged up פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the faces זְקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> of elders לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> were not נֶהְדָּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1921><s%> were not honoured

בַּחוּרִים֙ <S%H970><s%> the young men טְח֣וֹן <S%H2911><s%> to grind נָשָׂ֔אוּ <S%H5375><s%> They took וּנְעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> and the children בָּעֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> under the wood כָּשָֽׁלוּ׃ <S%H3782><s%> fell
זְקֵנִים֙ <S%H2205><s%> The elders מִשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> from the gate שָׁבָ֔תוּ <S%H7673><s%> have ceased בַּחוּרִ֖ים <S%H970><s%> the young men מִנְּגִינָתָֽם׃ <S%H5058><s%> from their musick

שָׁבַת֙ <S%H7673><s%> is ceased מְשׂ֣וֹשׂ <S%H4885><s%> The joy לִבֵּ֔נוּ <S%H3820><s%> of our heart נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <S%H2015><s%> is turned לְאֵ֖בֶל <S%H60><s%> into mourning מְחֹלֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H4234><s%> our dance

נָֽפְלָה֙ <S%H5307><s%> is fallen עֲטֶ֣רֶת <S%H5850><s%> The crown רֹאשֵׁ֔נוּ <S%H7218><s%> [from] our head אֽוֹי־ <S%H188><s%> woe נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee לָ֖נוּ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for חָטָֽאנוּ׃ <S%H2398><s%> unto us that we have sinned

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because זֶ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> of this הָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become דָוֶה֙ <S%H1739><s%> is faint לִבֵּ֔נוּ <S%H3820><s%> For this our heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Because אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these חָשְׁכ֥וּ <S%H2821><s%> are dim עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5869><s%> for these [things] our eyes

עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> Because הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> Because of the mountain צִיּוֹן֙ <S%H6726><s%> of Zion שֶׁשָּׁמֵ֔ם <S%H8074><s%> which is desolate שׁוּעָלִ֖ים <S%H7776><s%> the foxes הִלְּכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> walk בֽוֹ׃ פ

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> you יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever תֵּשֵׁ֔ב <S%H3427><s%> remainest כִּסְאֲךָ֖ <S%H3678><s%> thy throne לְדֹ֥ר <S%H1755><s%> from generation וָדֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> to generation

לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why לָנֶ֙צַח֙ <S%H5331><s%> us for ever תִּשְׁכָּחֵ֔נוּ <S%H7911><s%> Wherefore dost thou forget תַּֽעַזְבֵ֖נוּ <S%H5800><s%> [and] forsake לְאֹ֥רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> us so long יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> age

הֲשִׁיבֵ֨נוּ <S%H7725><s%> Turn יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> thou us unto thee O LORD אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H413><s%> about [וְנָשׁוּב כ] (וְֽנָשׁ֔וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> Restore ק) חַדֵּ֥שׁ <S%H2318><s%> renew יָמֵ֖ינוּ <S%H3117><s%> our days כְּקֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> as of old

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo מָאֹ֣ס <S%H3988><s%> But thou hast utterly מְאַסְתָּ֔נוּ <S%H3973><s%> refuse קָצַ֥פְתָּ <S%H7107><s%> wroth עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> art מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> us thou art very
